sn4.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava uruvelayam viharati najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhamule pathamabhisambuddho.
sn4.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava rattandhakaratimisayam abbhokase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekamekam phusayati.
sn4.3:1.4: Atha kho maro papima, bhagavato bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo, yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato avidure uccavaca vannanibha upadamseti, subha ceva asubha ca.
sn4.3:1.5: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
